name: Tokyo Ride
description: Learn Japanese on the Go!   Tokyo Ride is not just one of the typical Japanese learning applications, but an intuitive, fast paced, fun game to play!  Keep yourself entertained while studying all the hiragana, katakana and kanji!   Guide Riku the Japanese flying squirrel and collect all the characters around Tokyo! Explore all the famous spots like Shibuya, Shinjuku, Roppongi and Asakusa.   Beat high-scores, prepare for JLPT, test your knowledge, get familiar with Tokyo, dress Riku the way you like and study Japanese on a completely new way!   Get on the Ride!
